summary.span: 表示允許使用者從它的子項目之中選取項目的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

summary.span: 將項目容器還原成 之前的狀態。

span.span: Returns an item container to the state it was in before .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除從視覺化樹狀結構移除項目容器時，附加屬性。 clears the attached property when the item container is removed from the visual tree. 這是讓項目容器可以正常運作時使用容器回收功能。This is done so item containers behave correctly when the uses container recycling. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和 「 容器回收 」 中[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see and "Container Recycling" in [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否項目已選取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用附加屬性，以選取中的項目當您未明確建立的項目容器。Use the attached property to select an item in the when you do not explicitly create the item container. 項目容器是類別，表示中的項目。An item container is a class that represents an item in the . ，並是繼承自控制項的項目容器，和每個定義**IsSelected**屬性。, , and are item containers for the controls that inherit from , and each defines an **IsSelected** property. 如果您未明確建立項目容器，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]隱含地建立一個，並設定**IsSelected**屬性的值的項目容器。If you do not explicitly create an item container, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] implicitly creates one and sets the **IsSelected** property on the item container to the value of . 這是唯一的時間讀取。This is the only time is read. 不會更新如果項目上的選取範圍變更。 is not updated if the selection on the item changes. 如果您明確地建立項目容器，您應該使用**IsSelected**該類別的屬性。If you explicitly create an item container, you should use the **IsSelected** property on that class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|註冊為連結的資源, registered as Attached| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立，其中包含兩個控制項。The follow example creates a that contains two controls. 此範例不會明確地建立其中一個，因此它會設定直接在每個。The example does not explicitly create a for either , so it sets directly on each . 展示是未更新，範例會繫結屬性的第一個核取方塊以。To illustrate that is not updated, the example binds the property of the first checkbox to . 當使用者取消選取中的項目，則保持核取狀態。When the user unselects the item in the , the remains checked. 同樣地，選取或取消選取不會影響是否中選取。Likewise, checking or unchecking the does not affect whether the is selected in the . 此範例會將繫結第二個至。The example binds of the second to . 在此情況下，取消選取中的項目導致為未核取核取方塊，並且取消核取方塊也會取消選取的項目。In this case, unselecting the item in the causes the checkbox to be unchecked, and unchecking the checkbox also unselects the item. ```xaml CheckBox.IsChecked is bound to Selector.IsChecked, which is set only once. CheckBox.IsChecked is bound to ListBoxItem.IsChecked, which is updated throughout the duration of the application. ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 是否應維持 與 屬性中的目前項目同步。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a should keep the synchronized with the current item in the property.

value.span: 如果 一直與 中的目前項目同步，則為 。如果 永遠不與目前項目同步，則為 。如果 僅在 使用 時與目前項目同步，則為 。

span.span: if the is always synchronized with the current item in the ; if the is never synchronized with the current item; if the is synchronized with the current item only if the uses a .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性，以`true`以確保一律選取的項目對應至屬性中的。You can set the property to `true` to ensure that the item selected always corresponds to the property in the . 例如，假設有兩個具有控制其屬性設定為相同的來源。For example, suppose that there are two controls with their property set to the same source. 設定要`true`這兩個清單方塊，以確保在每個選取的項目上相同。Set to `true` on both list boxes to ensure that the selected item in each is the same. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會繫結兩個至相同的控制項。The following example binds two controls to the same . 因為設定為`true`每個，選取的項目一定是相同的兩個控制項Because is set to `true` on each , the selected item is always the same for both controls [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件控制項。The following examples show how to use the event with a control. 第一個範例會引發事件，第二個示範如何處理事件。The first example raises the event and the second shows how to handle the event. [!code-xml[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#selectorevents)] [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelected](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselected)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelected](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselected)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取範圍中第一個項目的索引，若選取範圍是空的，則傳回 -1。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.

value.span: 目前選取範圍中第一個項目的索引。

span.span: The index of first item in the current selection.
The default value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援選取單一項目，屬性會傳回所選取項目的索引。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the index of the selected item. 如果支援多個選取的項目，傳回使用者第一次選取之項目的索引。If a supports multiple selections, returns the index of the item that the user selected first. 設定在，支援多個選取項目清除現有的選取項目，並將選取項目設定為指定索引的項目。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified by the index. 如果選取項目是空的則傳回-1。 returns -1 if selection is empty. 如果您設定的值小於該-1，就會擲回。If you set to a value less that -1, an is thrown. 如果您將設定值等於或大於項目子系的數目，會忽略這個值。If you set to a value equal or greater than the number of child elements, the value is ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定屬性設為 1，其會選取中的第二個項目。The following example creates a and sets the property to 1, which selects the second item in the . [!code-xaml[ListBoxItems_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] 下列範例會使用屬性來判斷索引 0 處的項目是否選取範圍中的第一個項目。The following example uses the property to determine whether the item at index 0 is the first item in the selection. [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselectedindex)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselectedindex)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援選取單一項目，屬性會傳回選取的項目。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the selected item. 如果支援多個選取的項目，傳回使用者第一次選取的項目。If a supports multiple selections, returns the item that the user selected first. 設定在，支援多個選取項目清除現有的選取項目，並將選取項目設定為指定的項目。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會取得從。The following example gets the from a . span.span: Gets or sets the value of the , obtained by using .
The value of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷的值屬性的路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 設定值 X 次嘗試選取其值會評估為 X 的項目; 如果找不到任何這類項目，會清除選取範圍。Setting to a value X attempts to select an item whose value evaluates to X; if no such item can be found, the selection is cleared. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合`Employee`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 範例會設定要`@EmployeeNumber`並至`12345`。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 這會選取`Employee`具有`12345`的值為`EmployeeNumber`。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此範例也會繫結要的。This example also binds a to the of the . 當使用者變更中的選取範圍，則會更新以顯示目前所選員工的員工數目。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷的值屬性的路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合`Employee`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 範例會設定要`@EmployeeNumber`並至`12345`。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 這會選取`Employee`具有`12345`的值為`EmployeeNumber`。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此範例也會繫結要的。This example also binds a to the of the . 當使用者變更中的選取範圍，則會更新以顯示目前所選員工的員工數目。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. summary.span: 發生於 的選取範圍變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of a changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取項目變更時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs whenever there is a change to a selection. 可以變更選取範圍，不只是可以與使用者互動還可以繫結，以及其他設定的值。A selection can be changed not only by user interaction but also by binding as well as other set values. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加清單方塊控制項的事件。The following example shows how to attach the event to a list box control. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下列範例示範如何處理事件。The following example shows how to handle the event. [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
